solution_line_template: First find the total number of tools in the Walmart multitool: {walmart_screwdriver} tool + {walmart_knives} tools + {walmart_other_tools} tools = <<{walmart_screwdriver}+{walmart_knives}+{walmart_other_tools}={walmart_total}>>{walmart_total} tools

Then find the total number of knives in the Target multitool: {walmart_knives} knives * {target_knives_multiplier} = <<{walmart_knives}*{target_knives_multiplier}={target_knives}>>{target_knives} knives

Then find the total number of tools in the Target multitool: {target_screwdriver} tool + {target_knives} tools + {target_files} tools + {target_scissors} tool = <<{target_screwdriver}+{target_knives}+{target_files}+{target_scissors}={target_total}>>{target_total} tools

Then subtract the number of tools in the Walmart multitool from the number in the Target multitool to find the difference: {target_total} tools - {walmart_total} tools = <<{target_total}-{walmart_total}={difference}>>{difference} tools
